name: ZX Spectrum Planet War
description:
This is a ZX Spectrum turn-based game for 1 or 2 players.

Every player has a space ship, the goal is to shoot a missile and destroy the opposing ship; between the ships is a planet, the gravity of which will affect the missile's trajectory.

Don't shoot yourself!

Note: when played in 1-player mode, the opponent ship is piloted by the computer, who usually destroys your ship at the third/fourth attempt.

Please note: the game menu and some messages are in italian.
